title: Play and Rebuild Together Tournament
text:
The Play and Rebuild Together Tournament () was an charity international <a href="Association%20football">football</a> tournament contested by the men's national veterans' teams. It took place in <a href="Albania">Albania</a> on 10 January 2020 and the profits gathered from these meetings went to those affected by <a href="2019%20Albania%20earthquake">2019 Albania earthquake</a>.
Squads.
The four men's national veterans' teams involved in the tournament were required to register a squad of over 11 players, including one or two goalkeepers.
Albania.
Manager: <a href="Ilir%20Shulku">Ilir Shulku</a>Reference:
Italy.
Manager: <a href="Gianni%20De%20Biasi">Gianni De Biasi</a>Reference:
